name: Sloum Adventure
description:
This game is about the sloums. Sloums are a subspecies of slimes. The slimes didn't like that there were sloums stronger than them. And the slumes were destroyed by the slimes! Save the last remnants of the sloums!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Control:

WASD - Move; SPACE - jump; E - use; Left mouse button - attack;

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

P.S. The game is only in Russian language :(
